alert.note: Alert for Hood; Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 04 at 4:19PM CDT until September 04 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Southwestern Parker and Hood County. * WHEN...Until 700 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas, ponding water on roadways, and elevated stream flows is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Weatherford, Mineral Wells, Granbury, Pecan Plantation, Willow Park, Hudson Oaks, Annetta, Lipan, Cool, Oak Trail Shores, Mineral Wells State Park, Tolar, Annetta South, Annetta North and Millsap.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
